Posts.Content: Aug 14, 2008 12:26PM grabby wrote: Well I went to the clinic and I really wasn't too concerned but now I am in a right old panic!  I had a mammogram and went to wait for the results and then they called me in for another mammogram on the breast that has changed shape.  They then took me for an ultrasound and after that I had to have two biopsys after which I was in a right old state I can tell you!  I am still suffering after my major op last month and now this.  Don't know how I am going to sleep till I get the results next week.  It just feels like such a huge shock!  I was shaking like a leaf.
Posts.Title: Larger/lower breast grabby grabby

Posts.Content: Jun 21, 2008 11:21AM grabby wrote: Well I wasnt too bothered until I looked on all the breast cancer websites and they nearly all list a change in the size of breast and if it is lower than the other as a symptom so thats really put the wind up me!
Posts.Title: Larger/lower breast grabby grabby

Posts.Content: Jul 7, 2008 08:38AM grabby wrote: Got my appointment for next Monday but am having an oophorectomy on Wednesday so can't go! Rang the clinic and will now be going on August 14th.  Just worried that it seems a long time to wait but obviously they don't think that there is too much to worry about.  Just have this little niggle in the back of my head thats saying...'but what if'...
Posts.Title: Larger/lower breast grabby grabby

Posts.Content: Aug 6, 2008 08:16AM grabby wrote: Well i had my oophorectomy on July 9th and I cannot believe the change in my breasts!  i have lost half a stone and i am sure its from them! Hopefully this means that the change in shape and size was hormone related but there is still a definite difference in size and shape that wasn't there before.  I would say it is even more noticeable now my boobs have got smaller. Going to the clinic next week, hope its not too bad because i am still really suffering after my op, do you think it will just be a mammogram?
Posts.Title: Larger/lower breast grabby grabby

Posts.Content: grabby wrote: Hello, I am a newbie. I noticed that my right breast is suddenly larger and lower than my left. I went to the dr and had to go back 3 weeks later to check it wasn't hormone related and I have now been referred to the breast clinic. Has anyone else had this problem?  Have never heard of it before, should I be worried?   Log in to post a reply
